versionInfo.fileDescription: robonobo is a music sharing application

messages.startupErr: robonobo encountered an error on startup. We are sorry :-( Please file a bug report at http://getsatisfaction.com/robonobo and we will fix it ASAP.
messages.jreVersionErr: The version of Java you have is too old - but a newer one should have been installed by robonobo! Please file a bug report at http://getsatisfaction.com/robonobo and we will fix it ASAP.
messages.launcherErr: robonobo encountered an error while launching. We are sorry :-( Please file a bug report at http://getsatisfaction.com/robonobo and we will fix it ASAP.
